price: The disbelievers should not think that they are unreachable; they cannot escape.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
